topic.title: Medication Series Number Observation - conformance rules

section.p: The medication series number observation can be used to indicate which in a series of administrations a particular administration represents (e.g. "hepatitis B vaccine number 2 was administered on Feb 07, 2004).

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF-341)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF-342)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="30973-2" Dose number (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF-344, CONF-345)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value, where its data type is INT (CONF-346, CONF-347)
